Title: SQL Injection
Description: Attacker injects malicious SQL via the login form.
Justification: Parameterised queries implemented across all database calls.

Title: Broken Authentication
Description: Weak password policy allows brute-force attacks.
Justification: No account lockout policy is currently in place.

Title: Sensitive Data Exposure
Description: PII transmitted over unencrypted HTTP in legacy endpoint.
Justification: Legacy endpoint scheduled for decommission within 30 days; risk accepted.

Title: Cross-Site Scripting
Description: Reflected XSS in the search results page.
Justification: Output is HTML-encoded using the framework's built-in escaping.

Title: Insecure Direct Object Reference
Description: Users can access other users' reports by changing the ID in the URL.
Justification: Access control checks are missing on the report endpoint.
